page.title: 23Update to 1986 article
page.content:
Brymbo steel works closed not long after, resulting in high unemployment in the area which exist today. There is a housing estate now on the old steelworks site. The social club and sports ground still exist. Stagnation seemd to be the order of the day, apart from addition housing very little new industry has come in and apart from the new univesity status of Wrexham Technical college which is a great asset, providing good further education, there may be little progression in the near future.
Stephen Price
